title: Report: iPhone 14 could feature improved battery life as Apple ditches Samsung for new TSMC 5G chips
content:
After Apple’s improvement over battery life on the iPhone 13 line, it seems like the company could go a step further with the iPhone 14, as it’s ditching Samsung for smaller and improved TSMC 5G chips.

more…

The post Report: iPhone 14 could feature improved battery life as Apple ditches Samsung for new TSMC 5G chips appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: It seems like Apple could improve again battery life on iPhone 14, as it's ditching Samsung for smaller and improved TSMC 5G chips.
